properties.name: Cuba Cuba Cafe & Bar
properties.description: Posted by Tdenver 1173 Delaware, Denver CO"A place that\'s the perfect mix of casual and hip, this golden triangle delight...will send subtle messages to your brain that you finally brought it out for an evening of fun. It\'s hard to do much better in the dinner category than to stop by Cuba Cuba." --Amanda M. Fasion and Nick Heartshorn

properties.name: Curious Theatre Company
properties.description: Posted by Tdenver 1080 Acoma St, Denver COCurious Theatre Company is a company of artists dedicated to producing Regional and World Premieres of the best new plays in theatre. Curious celebrates its role as a “theatre of the community”, striving to build bridges to our audiences that demonstrate the relevance of theatre in our daily lives.
